editPrivacy.title: What kind of Room?

private.title: Create Private Room
private.availability: the Room will be available for you in My Rooms
private.editable: you can edit the Room anytime
private.changePrivacyPossibility: you can make the Room public anytime

public.title: Create Public Room
public.availability: the Room will be available for everyone in Ruume library
public.editable: once created, you will not be able to edit the Room
public.changePrivacyPossibility: once created, you will not be able to make the Room private
